entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Double.ToString with two section separators and negative zero placing additional negative sign in output #70460
  • [NativeAOT] CreateThreadLocalContentionCountObject can be reentrant on NativeAOT and deadlock #70453
  • FileSystemWatcher_SymbolicLink_IncludeSubdirectories_DoNotDereferenceChildLink failed (OSX) #70450
  • `ConsoleStream.ReadByte` throws when `Console.Encoding` is UTF-16 #70448
  • Compiling Wasm AOT breaks when using protobuf-net 2.x as a dependency #70444
    7.0.0
  • System.Uri regression in .NET 7 #70443
  • StringComparer.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase.GetHashCode is broken (on Blazor) #70441
  • Feature request: Support DependencyContext.Default for single file applications #70438
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Obsolete crypto factory methods accepting a string #70436
  • [Mobile] SSL certificate hostname not verified when targeting local WebAPI #70434
  • [NativeAot] Integrate SingleFileTestRunner to the default runner #70432
  • TimeSpan.ParseExact throws exception for non-padded custom format specifiers in compound format strings #70429
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: IGetDebuggerDisplay #70426
  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] QuicProvider #70424
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Heif` and `Webp`. #70422
  • [API Proposal]: Allow custom JavaScriptEncoder that allows HTML-sensitive characters #70419
  • Complex architecture using DI scoped service #70415
  • Test failure System.Management.Tests.ManagementObjectTests.Invoke_Instance_And_Static_Method_Win32_Process #70414

Closed

  • Inefficient codegen for enum -> object -> int casts #55355
    7.0.0
  • Remove the pid argument from createdump command line and only take dumps on the parent process #42646
    7.0.0
  • Cannot understand the API design of Generic Math INumber.Create[XXXX] methods #62296
    7.0.0
  • Secrets are not being read from k8s mounted folder - AddKeyPerFile #70411
  • Expose TCP Keep-alive on SocketsHttpHandler #61261
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Test failures on NodeJS/Linux because RemoteExecutor is not supported #64776
    7.0.0
  • Assert failure: !LongFile::IsPathNotFullyQualified(path) || !LongFile::ContainsDirectorySeparator(path) #70293
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(tree->AsCast()->gtCastType == m_tailcall->gtReturnType) && "Expected cast after tailcall to be no-op"' #70334
    7.0.0
  • Mono runtime pack should include include/ directory on desktop, too #46461
    7.0.0
  • [macOS 11] System.Tests.EnvironmentTests.OSVersion_ValidVersion_OSX fails on CoreCLR #49106
    7.0.0
  • IQueryable.DefaultIfEmpty() marked as non-nullable even though it can return null values as a LEFT JOIN #69817
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Microseconds and Nanoseconds to Stopwatch #70425
  • [wasm][debugger] Send ASSEMBLY_LOAD event #54772
    Future
  • Mono debugger crashes attempting to breakpoint in a DIM in a generic interface #64408
    7.0.0
  • System. Drawing. Common does not support webp #70418
  • [Question] Interop between JsonNode and JsonElement #70427
  • Stack overflow due to recursion in WebAssembly produces assertion failure #68798
    7.0.0
  • CertificateSelection callback is not called when client use Unified framing #68310
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Evaluate list?.Count #69133
    7.0.0
  • Equals/GetHashCode for UnixDomainSocketEndPoint #69488
    Future
  • Logger using json format not display lists correctly #68975
    Future
  • Runtime error when invoking native dependency from Blazor/WebAssembly #62085
    7.0.0
  • System.ExecutionEngineException crash when debugging (0x80131506) #70409
  • Revisit NonBacktracking's avoiding of findOptimizations.LeadingAnchor #69060
    7.0.0
  • Internal CLR error while ILC.exe compiling Microsoft.CSharp in multifile mode #69593

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove SAFEARRAY APIs from PAL #70462
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for per-project customization of helix work items #70461
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Bump intellisense version to Preview4 #70459
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Dispose algorithm in SignatureSupport #70458
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • [NativeAOT] prevent reentering CreateThreadLocalContentionCountObject #70456
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove <Nullable>disable/annotations</Nullable> from test projects #70455
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable nullable for Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces #70454
  • JIT: Unspecialize handle types after arithmetic ops in VN #70452
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Make calls from the cold cconv wrappers through the PLT. #70449
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix usage of GSS_KRB5_CRED_NO_CI_FLAGS_X #70447
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Let low cost tree nodes reach CSE phase #70446
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updating the various generic math functions to have default implementations #70445
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable HMAC on Browser WASM #70442
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Add disasm comments for field data addresses and code addresses #70437
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JSON contract customization #70435
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Small MsQuicStream refactorings #70433
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JsonSerializer.DeserializeAsyncEnumerable should not wait until buffer is filled. #70430
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Handle HW exceptions on Windows without redirection #70428
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Removes abstract providers and mock from S.N.Quic #70421
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [Mono] Fix C4018 round I #70417
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][nodejs] Ensure that stdout/stderr have been flushed out before exiting #70416
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono

Merged

  • JIT: Handle enums in box-unbox optimization #70167
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove the pid argument on Windows createdump only take dumps of the parent process #68877
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix unit test example in documentation #70457
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Guard COM exception marshaling under FEATURE_COMINTEROP #70431
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove some unnecessary regex NonBacktracking code #70364
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/7.0-preview5] [wasm] [debugger] Removing usage of serilog #70383
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Update branding to 6.0.7 #70372
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Increase precision and safety of the NonVersionableAttribute #70327
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add legs to build wasm with internal threads only and full threading enabled #68787
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove old macOS compatibility code for RSA decryption #70397
    area-System.Security
  • Convert assert to exception for loading native libraries #70319
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Avoid unnecessary normalization for GT_RET_EXPR #70340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't call RuntimeHelper.Equals in Object.Equals #70420
    community-contribution
  • Include `include` folder in runtime pack on all Mono platforms #69719
    area-Build-mono
  • Delete a zero-diff quirk and update `INDEX`-related comments #70398
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove ActiveIssue on OSVersion_ValidVersion_OSX #70367
    area-System.Runtime
  • Mark IQueryable.DefaultIfEmpty() as nullable #69821
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • update dogfooding instruction for 7.0 #70423
    area-Meta
  • Stop normalizing managed calls in R2R #70339
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for processing Unified TLS frames #69848
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support for null-conditional operators in simple expressions #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Equals/GetHashCode for UnixDomainSocketEndPoint #69722
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Disable 2 FSW tests failing only on macOS 12 #70365
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: enable cloning based on loop invariant type tests #70377
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] Removing usage of serilog #70382
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: add ability to order blocks in dump by bbNum or bbID #70399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Tweak NonBacktracking condition used to employ RegexFindOptimizations #70405
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Improve Stopwatch DebuggerDisplayAttribute test #70394
    area-System.Diagnostics

Updated

  • Fix Crossgen2 PDB generator #70407
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add event to capture min/max threads #70063
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update to use Mariner 2.0 as the build image #70111
    area-Infrastructure
  • Test additional NativeAOT Lib testing #70212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • List other architectures in dotnet --info #70403
    area-Host
  • JIT: Do not propagate some constants #70378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Reenable C4244 and enable implicit-int-conversion in repo #70026
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Harden for null byrefs #70317
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Asynchronous thread suspension at GC safe points on Windows #70316
  • Modify tests to distinguish between emit- and interpreted-based invoke #70114
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup idle rate limiters #69677
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Add markdown Readme for System.Text.Json #69015
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • optimize BlockingCollection<T>.GetConsumingEnumerable iterator #69631
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Move analyzer and fixer tests into FuncionalTests project #70406
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [QUIC] Buffered reads #70148
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Detect inlining accurately and skip generating precode fixups for inlines that do not succeed #70379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement System.Buffers.Text.Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 for Arm64 #70336
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Update analyzer version and fix new findings #70157
    area-Meta
  • Reflection.Metadata.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #69999
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Fix ILGenerator maxstack computation #70388
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [Wasm] Add support for baseUrl and mainScriptPath #70375
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.9 #68765
    area-Build-mono
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][eventpipe] Write primitive types and UTF-16 strings in little endian order #68648
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Added Default Interface Method static tests. #70138
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add infrastructure for building WebWorkers #70220
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Introduce AOT friendly version of ToLogFont and FromLogFont #70224
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Add fake server test for Negotiate authentication. #70396
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Add basic testing infrastructure in NativeAOT (port from dotnet/linker) #70408
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow source generation for classes with ignored init-only props #69327
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add new public APIs for safely manipulating managed pointers #69458
    blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Enable IlcTrimMetadata by default #70201
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixes incorrect service resolution in Development environment #68053
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-author-action
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove unneeded unconditional jumps for Arm/Arm64 #70389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
